languages.text: Я видел как даже бывалые солдаты поддавались страху на поле боя. Неудивительно, что толпы отчаявшихся работяг охватила паника, стоило им увидеть, в какую мясорубку их отправили. Нам пришлось отбиваться не только от войск еретиков, но и от толп обезумевших гражданских, пытавшихся прорваться сквозь наши боевые порядки.

traits.locale_text: Я видел как даже бывалые солдаты поддавались страху на поле боя. Неудивительно, что толпы отчаявшихся работяг охватила паника, стоило им увидеть в какую мясорубку их отравили. Нам пришлось отбиваться не только от войск Хаоса, но и от обезумевших гражданских, пытавшихся от них бежать.

languages.text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.
languages.original_text: Я видел как даже бывалые солдаты поддавались страху на поле боя. Неудивительно, что толпы отчаявшихся работяг охватила паника, стоило им увидеть, в какую мясорубку их отправили. Нам пришлось отбиваться не только от войск еретиков, но и от толп обезумевших гражданских, пытавшихся прорваться сквозь наши боевые порядки.

traits.locale_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of scared witless civilians trying to break through out ranks.

I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of scared witless civilians trying to break through out ranks.

I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of scared witless civilians trying to break through out ranks.

I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of scared witless civilians trying to break through out ranks.

I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

languages.text: 即便是老兵，在战场上也可能会陷入恐慌。因此，当那些绝望的劳工发现自己被卷入了血腥屠杀的时候，他们会吓得六神无主，这实在是不足为奇。除了与异端分子作战之外，我们还得想办法对付那些在队伍中到处乱跑、惊慌失措的平民。
languages.original_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

traits.locale_text: 即便是老兵，在战场上也可能会被恐惧压垮。因此，当那些绝望的劳工发现自己被卷入了血腥屠杀的时候，他们会吓得六神无主忙着实在是不足为奇。除了与异端分子作战之外，我们还得想办法对付那些在我们的队伍中到处乱跑，惊慌失措的平民。

languages.text: Même les soldats les plus aguerris cèdent parfois à la peur sur le champ de bataille, il n'y a donc rien d'étonnant à ce qu'un groupe d'ouvriers désespérés ait été pris de panique en voyant le bain de sang dans lequel nous les avions jetés. En plus de combattre les hérétiques, nous devions également nous occuper des multitudes de civils terrorisés qui tentaient de rompre les rangs.
languages.original_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

traits.locale_text: Même les soldats les plus aguerris cèdent parfois à la peur sur le champ de bataille, il' n'y a donc rien d'étonnant à ce qu'un groupe d'ouvriers désespérés ait été pris de panique en voyant le bain de sang dans lequel nous les avions jetés. En plus de combattre les hérétiques, nous devions également nous occuper des multitudes de civils effrayés qui tentaient de rompre les rangs.

languages.text: 戦場で恐怖に屈する老兵を見たことがある。自暴自棄になった労働者の群れが、自分たちが投げ込まれた血の海を見た瞬間にパニックに陥るのも不思議ではない。異端者たちとの戦いに加えて、隊列を突破しようとする恐怖におののく民間人の群れに対処しなければならなかった。
languages.original_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

traits.locale_text: 戦場で恐怖に屈する老兵を見たことがある。自暴自棄になった労働者の群れが、自分たちが投げ込まれた血の海を見た瞬間にパニックに陥るのも不思議ではない。異端者たちとの戦いに加えて、隊列を突破しようとする恐怖におののく愚かな民間人の群れに対処しなければならなかった。

languages.text: He visto a soldados veteranos sucumbir al terror del campo de batalla. Por lógica, una hueste de trabajadores desesperados entraría en pánico al ver el baño de sangre que les esperaba. Además de a los herejes, ahora teníamos que hacer frente a civiles aterrados intentando atravesar nuestras filas.
languages.original_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

traits.locale_text: He visto a soldados veteranos sucumbir al terror del campo de batalla. Por lógica, una hueste de trabajadores desesperados entraría en pánico al ver el baño de sangre que les esperaba. Además de a los herejes, ahora teníamos que hacer frente a civiles aterrados intentando atravesar nuestras filas.

languages.text: Ich habe gesehen, wie alte Soldaten auf dem Schlachtfeld der Angst nachgegeben haben. Kein Wunder also, dass ein Pulk verzweifelter Arbeiter in Panik geriet, sobald sie das Blutbad sahen, in das man sie geworfen hatte. Wir mussten nicht nur die Ketzer bekämpften, sondern uns nun auch noch mit unzähligen panischen Zivilisten herumschlagen, die versuchten, unsere Reihen zu durchbrechen.
languages.original_text: I've seen old soldiers give in to fear on the battlefield. It's little wonder, then, that a throng of desperate labourers would panic the moment they saw the bloodbath they'd been thrown into. On top of fighting the heretics, we now had to deal with droves of civilians scared out of their minds, trying to break through our ranks.

traits.locale_text: Ich habe gesehen, wie alte Soldaten auf dem Schlachtfeld der Angst nachgegeben haben. Kein Wunder also, dass ein Pulk verzweifelter Arbeiter in Panik geriet, sobald sie das Blutbad sahen, in das man sie geworfen hatte. Wir mussten nicht nur die Ketzer bekämpften, sondern uns nun auch noch mit unzähligen panischen Zivilisten herumschlagen, die versuchten, unsere Reihen zu durchbrechen.
